mapper.insert: insert into tb_wallpaper(wallpaperId, labels, username, tag) values (#{uniqueFileName}, #{labels}, #{username}, #{tag})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_wallpaper SET labels = #{labels}, tag = #{tag}, uploadTime = now() WHERE wallpaperId = #{wallpaperId} ORDER BY uploadTime DESC
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_wallpaper where wallpaperId = #{id} ORDER BY uploadTime DESC
